00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              CROSSFADER (2 INPUTS / 1 OUTPUT)
00004  *******************************************************
00005  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00006  *              copyright © 2003 by Timothy A. Place
00007  *
00008  */
00009 
00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_CROSSFADE_H
00012 #define TT_CROSSFADE_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_crossfade:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00028                 typedef void (tt_crossfade::*FuncPtr)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00029                 FuncPtr dsp_executor;
00030 
00031                 // Attribute Values & Variables
00032                 tt_attribute_value              position;
00033                 tt_attribute_value              shape;
00034                 tt_attribute_value              mode;
00035                         
00036                 
00037         public:
00038                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00039                         k_shape,
00040                         k_mode,
00041                         k_position,
00042                         k_shape_equalpower,
00043                         k_shape_linear,
00044                         k_mode_lookup,
00045                         k_mode_calculate
00046                 };
00047                 
00048                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00049                 tt_crossfade(void)                                                                      // Constructor          
00050                 {
00051                         position = 0.5;
00052                         shape = k_shape_equalpower;
00053                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_lookup);
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 ~tt_crossfade(void)                                                             // Destructor
00057                 {
00058                         ;
00059                 }
00060 
00061 
00062                 // ATTRIBUTES
00063                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00064                 {
00065                         switch (sel){
00066                                 case k_position:
00067                                         position = clip(val, (float)0.0, (float)1.0);
00068                                         break;
00069                                 case k_shape:
00070                                         shape = val;
00071                                         break;
00072                                 case k_mode:
00073                                         mode = val;
00074                                         break;
00075                         }
00076                         // set the function pointer for the correct dsp loop to run
00077                         if(shape == k_shape_linear)
00078                                 dsp_executor = &tt_crossfade::dsp_vector_calc_linear;
00079                         else if(mode == k_mode_calculate)
00080                                 dsp_executor = &tt_crossfade::dsp_vector_calc_equalpower_calc;
00081                         else if(mode == k_mode_lookup)
00082                                 dsp_executor = &tt_crossfade::dsp_vector_calc_equalpower_lookup;
00083                         
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00087                 {
00088                         switch (sel){
00089                                 case k_position:
00090                                         return position;
00091                                 case k_shape:
00092                                         return shape;
00093                                 case k_mode:
00094                                         return mode;
00095                                 default:
00096                                         return 0.0;
00097                         }
00098                 }
00099                 
00100                 
00101                 /*****************************************************
00102                  * DSP LOOPS
00103                  *****************************************************/
00104                 
00105                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00106                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out)
00107                 {
00108                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in1, in2, out);   // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00109                 }
00110         
00111         private:
00112                 // DSP LOOP: LINEAR SHAPE
00113                 void dsp_vector_calc_linear(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out)
00114                 {
00115                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00116                         while(temp_vs--)
00117                                 *out->vector++ = (*in2->vector++ * position) + (*in1->vector++ * (1.0 - position));
00118                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out->reset();
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 // DSP LOOP: EQUAL POWER LOOKUP MODE
00122                 void dsp_vector_calc_equalpower_lookup(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out)
00123                 {
00124                         int index;
00125                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00126                         while(temp_vs--){
00127                                 index = (int)(position * 511.0);
00128                                 *out->vector++ = (*in2->vector++ * lookup_equalpower[511 - index]) + (*in1->vector++ * lookup_equalpower[index]);
00129                         }
00130                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out->reset();
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 // DSP LOOP: EQUAL POWER CALCULATED
00134                 void dsp_vector_calc_equalpower_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out)
00135                 {
00136                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00137                         while(temp_vs--)
00138                                 *out->vector++ = (*in2->vector++ * (sin(position * 1.5707963))) + (*in1->vector++ * (sin((1 - position) * 1.5707963)));
00139                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out->reset();
00140                 }
00141                 
00142 };
00143 
00144 #endif // TT_CROSSFADE_H
